moves.name: Psychic
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of lowering the target’s Sp. Def.

moves.name: X Defense All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Defense of all allied sync pairs.

passives.name: Head Start 6
passives.description: Reduces the sync move countdown by 6 when the Pokémon enters a battle for the first time.

passives.name: Safety Net
passives.description: Makes all allied sync pairs able to endure the next hit they take that would reduce them to 0 HP when a sync move is used for the first time.

passives.name: Team Sync Regen
passives.description: Makes all allied sync pairs gradually heal themselves after the user uses a sync move.
